_doc: Defines array of rigs to collect the data from.

Rigs._doc1: Name of the rig. Can be anything. This value will be helpful for filtering when analizing the data.
Rigs.Name: Rig1
Rigs._doc2: Ip address of the machine where Claymore miner is running. Use 127.0.0.1 if running data collector on the same machine.
Rigs._doc3: Claymore miner management port. Default value is 3333
